description: An AI agent is tasked with optimizing the yield of a semiconductor manufacturing process.  This involves analyzing sensor data, adjusting process parameters, and monitoring output quality over several production cycles. The process should run without significant deviations or errors.
initial_goal: Maximize wafer yield in the semiconductor fabrication process while maintaining acceptable defect rates and adhering to established process parameters.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor manufacturing, specifically focusing on a 7nm node fabrication process for high-performance computing chips.
